name: CCPA Compliance Framework
description: California Consumer Privacy Act framework for protecting California residents' personal information and providing consumer rights.

framework.name: CCPA Compliance Framework
framework.description: Framework for California Consumer Privacy Act compliance

structure.title: Consumer Rights
structure.description: Rights granted to California consumers under CCPA

items.title: Right to Know
items.description: Consumers have the right to know what personal information is collected about them
items.summary: Enable consumers to know what data is collected
questions: Is there a process to respond to requests?
Is the response provided within 45 days?

items.title: Right to Delete
items.description: Consumers have the right to request deletion of their personal information
items.summary: Enable consumers to delete their data

items.title: Right to Opt-Out
items.description: Consumers have the right to opt-out of the sale of their personal information
items.summary: Provide opt-out mechanism for data sales
questions: Is there a 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information' link?
Is the opt-out easy to use?

items.title: Right to Non-Discrimination
items.description: Consumers cannot be discriminated against for exercising their CCPA rights
items.summary: Ensure no discrimination for rights exercise
questions: Are consumers treated equally regardless of rights exercise?

structure.title: Business Obligations
structure.description: Requirements businesses must fulfill under CCPA

items.title: Privacy Notice
items.description: Provide consumers with notice of data collection practices
questions: Does the privacy policy describe data categories collected?

items.title: Data Inventory
items.description: Maintain inventory of personal information collected, sold, or disclosed

items.title: Service Provider Contracts
items.description: Ensure contracts with service providers include required CCPA provisions
questions: Are service providers certified as such?

items.title: Employee Training
items.description: Train employees who handle consumer inquiries about CCPA requirements

structure.title: Security Requirements
structure.description: Reasonable security measures to protect personal information

items.title: Reasonable Security
items.description: Implement and maintain reasonable security procedures and practices
questions: Are security measures appropriate to the data?

items.title: Breach Notification
items.description: Notify consumers of security breaches involving their personal information
questions: Is there a breach response plan?
Is there a process to assess breach scope?
